name: BILLY CRIPPLE in the Well of Lost Souls
name_original: BILLY CRIPPLE in the Well of Lost Souls
description:
You are Billy.

You went to Hell.

Your punishment: NO LEGS.

In BILLY CRIPPLE in the Well of Lost Souls, you are a poor crippled man with no legs who has to escape from the Depths of the Hell's Dungeons, avoiding the monsters in there or fighting them as he can.

You can TRY to move in this game. Emphasis on TRYING.

CREDITS:

harvey656 for the sound effects

Made with Unity

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD to move, collect potions for extra bonuses, unlock doors with keys by collecting the keys, avoid or fight monsters, ESCAPE!

A JMAA GAMES game jam submission for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3, made in a record time of 2 days.
